title: NO DEMAND FOR EELAM AS KARUNANIDHI DROPS CONTROVERSIAL CLAMOUR AT TESO UNDER PRESSURE FROM NEW DELHI
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana DMK leader Muthuvel Karunanidhi who came under the pressure of  New Delhi had to drop his demand  to create a separate state called Eelam the Times of India reported….
